headline: Why The Narrative Around Caterpillar Is Shifting After Fresh Analyst Updates and New Developments
summary: Consensus analyst sentiment around Caterpillar stock has shifted upward, as indicated by a notable increase in the average price target from $559 to $588. This rise reflects renewed confidence following Caterpillar’s robust quarterly earnings and strengthening order backlogs, particularly in key business segments.
